title: manasunanera
sahitya:
manasuna nera nammitini mahimalu vini nE satatamu

(manasuna)



anupallavi



anagha nanneTlaina Adarinci brOtu vanutsu

(manasuna)



caraNam



krUruDaina kAkAsuruDu kOri sharaNa managa natani krUra krtyamulaku

nIvE kOpimpaka gAsinaTula

NEramentO nE jEsinanu nannu mannintuvanucu vAraNArti haraNa shrI varada

venkatEshuDanucu 

(manasuna)
